0100010100110010 1111100110011011 0 -> sum: 0011111011001101, cout: 1
1011010111110001 1101000100001110 0 -> sum: 1000011011111111, cout: 1
1010010010000110 1101110000000010 1 -> sum: 1000000010001001, cout: 1
